items.reviewContent: This washing machine is good value to money. The washing is very good and hasle free. Delivered on time. The only problem was that the button panel of the machine is a bit off centered. Can't see the full digits from the front( as shown in the picture) so you have to lean back to the right side to see the numbers. Which I guess is a manufacturer fault. Other than that the machine is fine and works perfectly.

You can contact us on chat if you have any concerns.
